answerText: Bolero[10]  This impressionist composer of Bolero also wrote the piano composition, Gaspard de la nuit. As part of the artistic group Les Apaches, he composed the five-movement Miroirs.

subject: Fine Arts
question: Question:  [10]  Name this work of a French composer based on a Latin rhythm in Â¾ time played on the snare drum. The tam-tam, cymbals and bass drum only play in the last 6 bars, which also features trombone glissandi.
